resources.string: Connect with our Deaf friends through Bigkas\' FSL to Voice Translation.
Wow! Great Detection. Express your FSL and Bigkas will detect it.
I can do it too. Talk to our Deaf friends with Bigkas\' implementation of Fingerspelling.
TechKnow is a group of like-minded individuals committed to excellence and aims to connect people together through the use of technology.
Bigkas is an Android application that outputs the detected Filipino Sign Language in real time and displays the corresponding fingerspelling for the text entered.
Open Bigkas application and select the scan button.
Position the camera at waist level to start the detection. Upong successful detection, the text and speech output will be displayed.
To translate words into its corresponding fingerspelling input the text to be translated..
